that that's roughly all the same

gonna use two cookies but you can also

now you want to sort of sandwich them
together so you want the good side of

so and then we're gonna spoon some of

way down to the corner and letting out
any air before you seal them up and then
we're just going to
just sort of a bit of a chunky tip off
the end of each one and this is just
going to enable us to have a neater

then with the gem this is totally

two the red and the white perfect so
